FuncDef: This command creates the path to be used for an LSP. A path can be used by multiple LSPs. A path can specify some or all hops from ingress to egress and they can be eitherstrictorloose. A path can also be empty (nopath-namespecified) in which case the LSP is set up based on IGP (best effort) calculated shortest path to the egress router. Paths are created in ashutdownstate. A path must be shutdown before making any changes (adding or deleting hops) to the path. When a path is shutdown, any LSP using the path becomes operationally down.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a unique case-sensitive alphanumeric name label for the LSP path up to 32 characters in length.
